desc: Order the World's Hottest Chillies, Australian Grown, Delivered Farm Fresh to You. Carolina Reaper, Naga Bhut Jolokia (Ghost Pepper), Scotch Bonnet, Trinidad 7 Pod Yellow, Many Habanero Varieties. Discover Hard-To-Find Vegetables from around the World!

layout.text: Australian Grown Super Hot Chillies, Delivered Farm Fresh to You
